revised_title: Roman Altar Inscription Found Near Stanhope in the Bishopric of Durham
tldr: The Reverend Mr. Thomas Birch discovered an ancient Roman altar inscription near Stanhope in the Bishopric of Durham. The inscription is dedicated to Silvano, an undefeated Roman deity, and was placed by C. Tetius Veturius Micianus, a Prefect of the Ala Sebosiana. The altar is notable for its mention of a captured apron, which many of Veturius' predecessors were unable to seize.
